医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
新研究揭示烟草 21 世纪政策的更大影响2020年，随着全国越来越多的州和地方寻求提高购买烟草的年龄以保护年轻人的健康，联邦购买烟草产品的最低年龄正式从18岁提高到21岁。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-research-reveals-greater-impact-of-Tobacco-21-policies.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-research-reveals-greater-impact-of-Tobacco-21-policies.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=93832e72-0a98-4c82-b7f1-db52ed24b884 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 09:11:00 -0500 New research reveals greater impact of Tobacco 21 policies
耶鲁大学的研究确定了一些无脑畸形疾病背后的分子机制无脑畸形是一系列罕见的遗传性疾病，其中大脑无法发育出其标志性的褶皱。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Yale-study-identizes-molecular-mechanism-behind-some-lissencephaly-disorders.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Yale-study-identizes-molecular-mechanism-behind-some-lissencephaly-disorders.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f3cff771-22db-4743-bba7-080a19ac895e Thu, 02 Jan 2025 08:42:00 -0500 Yale study identifies molecular mechanism behind some lissencephaly disorders
新的人工智能技术改善了 PET 和 CT 扫描中的肿瘤检测人工智能有潜力改善医学图像数据的分析。例如，基于深度学习的算法可以确定肿瘤的位置和大小。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-AI-techniques-improve-tumor-detection-in-PET-and-CT-scans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/New-AI-techniques-improve-tumor-detection-in-PET-and-CT-scans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=00b3e0d6-6573-4ca8-a4e8-442493c6809a Thu, 02 Jan 2025 07:50:40 -0500 New AI techniques improve tumor detection in PET and CT scans
研究探索碳纳米管如何帮助去除水中的类固醇激素类固醇激素是最广泛的水生微污染物之一。它们对人类健康有害，并导致水生环境的生态失衡。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Research-explores-how-carbon-nanotubes-help-remove-steroid-hormones-from-water.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Research-explores-how-carbon-nanotubes-help-remove-steroid-hormones-from-water.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7242f2ca-4f1a-4c2d-84b2-caaf4b8f7443 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 07:40:00 -0500 Research explores how carbon nanotubes help remove steroid hormones from water
重新界定性别差距可以促进女性领导力的行动对许多人来说，副总统卡玛拉·哈里斯在 2024 年总统选举中的落败清醒地提醒人们，不仅在政府领导职位上，而且在商界、高等教育和军队中，领导职位上都存在着更大且持续的性别差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Reframing-gender-gaps-can-spur-action-on-female-leadership.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Reframing-gender-gaps-can-spur-action-on-female-leadership.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0c3a7bc2-b304-48f5-b3b9-b37507d0f667 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 07:28:49 -0500
人工智能模型在现实世界的医学对话中举步维艰ChatGPT 等人工智能工具因承诺通过对患者进行分类、获取病史甚至提供初步诊断来减轻临床医生的工作量而受到称赞。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/AI-models-struggle-in-real-world-medical-conversations.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/AI-models-struggle-in-real-world-medical-conversations.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cce382d8-bd19-448b-b518-ad637bc77af5 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 06:22:48 -0500 AI models struggle in real-world medical conversations
需要紧急培训来解决亚太地区卫生人力日益扩大的差距该行业领导人表示，迫切需要对卫生工作者（包括那些获得服务机会有限的社区的卫生工作者）进行培训，以解决亚太地区卫生人力日益扩大的缺口。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Urgent-training-needed-to-address-forming-gap-in-the-Asia-Pacific-health-workforce.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Urgent-training-needed-to-address-forming-gap-in-the-Asia-Pacific-health-workforce.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bf702816-cf92-463b-a1f3-9487614ea02c Thu, 02 Jan 2025 06:12:00 -0500 Urgent training needed to address growing gap in the Asia Pacific health workforce
核斑点的发现可能会改善癌症治疗决策对抗癌症似乎是一场致命的机会游戏。虽然有些患者可能对某些治疗反应良好，但其他患者可能就没那么幸运了。长期以来，医生和科学家们一直在努力解释其中的原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Discovery-of-nuclear-speckles-may-improve-cancer-treatment-decisions.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Discovery-of-nuclear-speckles-may-improve-cancer-treatment-decisions.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b0af5f8b-1cf3-49c4-beb4-f7c3f51240b3 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 06:07:02 -0500 Discovery of nuclear speckles may improve cancer treatment decisions
基于人工智能的模型在识别卵巢癌方面可以超越人类专家瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院的研究人员领导的一项新的国际研究表明，基于人工智能的模型在超声图像中识别卵巢癌方面可以超越人类专家。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/AI-based-models-can-outperform- human-experts-at-identifying-ovarian-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/AI-based-models-can-outperform- human-experts-at-identifying-ovarian-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2e87d9e2-e114-4297-92b3-fc52d43fe3f5 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 05:56:43 -0500 AI-based models can outperform human experts at identifying ovarian cancer
裸盖菇素显示出治疗癌症和成瘾患者精神健康障碍的潜力一份新的报告表明，一剂或两剂裸盖菇素（一种在迷幻蘑菇中发现的化合物）在配合心理治疗时可以改善癌症患者的心理健康。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Psilocybin-shows-pottial-for-treating-mental-health-disorders-in-people-with-cancer-and-addiction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250102/Psilocybin-shows-pottial-for-treating-mental-health-disorders-in-people-with-cancer-and-addiction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=8e683313-350a-4924-9198-a5ae2fbb04a6 Thu, 02 Jan 2025 05:46:01 -0500 Psilocybin shows potential for treating mental health disorders in people with cancer and addiction
